question: 油田
sourceMnemonic: An <kanji>oil</kanji> <kanji>rice paddy</kanji> is really more like an <vocabulary>oil field</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. You haven't learned this reading for <ja>田</ja> yet. Just think about how you walk into the <vocabulary>oil field</vocabulary> and you see a bear <reading>den</reading> (<ja>でん</ja>), filled with oil.
